review: I will begin by saying that when I ordered the Fire TV Stick I already owned the Fire TV box.  The Fire TV box is in the living room.  There have been occasions when I wanted to watch TV before going to bed.  That was solved by ordering the Fire TV Stick.  I love it!  Amazon makes everything so easy for you with the installation and even better, as a Prime member it was registered to me when it arrived.  It does everything the Fire TV box does except the remote for the Fire TV Stick does not do voice commands.  I did not find that a problem since I can use the voice command option with the box in the living room.  If you want to add this to a child's room there is an option to control programming too. The operation for either Fire TV products is easy and really intuitive.  The only regret that I have is that I wish I would have ordered it sooner.  Highly recommended.
